channel.title: Need some Silabsoft client help

item.title: Need some Silabsoft client help
item.dc:creator: @Fatal1ty Fatal1ty
item.description:
@Fatal1ty wrote:

I need a new ::pickup command code for my server because the pickup command I have doesnâ€™t work with the newer items

My current pickup command is

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pk4r Pk4r") || playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { } }

Can anyone help me get it to work with the newer items?

Read full topic
